name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: The business identifier for this task.

name: $addidentifier
desc: The business identifier for this task.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The business identifier for this task.

name: $basedOn
desc: Returns: BasedOn refers to a higher-level authorization that triggered the creation of the task.  It references a "request" resource such as a ProcedureRequest, MedicationRequest, ProcedureRequest, CarePlan, etc. which is distinct from the "request" resource the task is seeking to fulfil.  This latter resource is referenced by FocusOn.  For example, based on a ProcedureRequest (= BasedOn), a task is created to fulfil a procedureRequest ( = FocusOn ) to collect a specimen from a patient.

name: $addbasedOn
desc: BasedOn refers to a higher-level authorization that triggered the creation of the task.  It references a "request" resource such as a ProcedureRequest, MedicationRequest, ProcedureRequest, CarePlan, etc. which is distinct from the "request" resource the task is seeking to fulfil.  This latter resource is referenced by FocusOn.  For example, based on a ProcedureRequest (= BasedOn), a task is created to fulfil a procedureRequest ( = FocusOn ) to collect a specimen from a patient.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: BasedOn refers to a higher-level authorization that triggered the creation of the task.  It references a "request" resource such as a ProcedureRequest, MedicationRequest, ProcedureRequest, CarePlan, etc. which is distinct from the "request" resource the t

name: $groupIdentifier
desc: Returns: An identifier that links together multiple tasks and other requests that were created in the same context.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An identifier that links together multiple tasks and other requests that were created in the same context.

name: $partOf
desc: Returns: Task that this particular task is part of.

name: $addpartOf
desc: Task that this particular task is part of.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Task that this particular task is part of.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The current status of the task.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The current status of the task.

name: $statusReason
desc: Returns: An explanation as to why this task is held, failed, was refused, etc.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An explanation as to why this task is held, failed, was refused, etc.

name: $businessStatus
desc: Returns: Contains business-specific nuances of the business state.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Contains business-specific nuances of the business state.

name: $intent
desc: Returns: Indicates the "level" of actionability associated with the Task.  I.e. Is this a proposed task, a planned task, an actionable task, etc.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates the "level" of actionability associated with the Task.  I.e. Is this a proposed task, a planned task, an actionable task, etc.

name: $priority
desc: Returns: Indicates how quickly the Task should be addressed with respect to other requests.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates how quickly the Task should be addressed with respect to other requests.

name: $code
desc: Returns: A name or code (or both) briefly describing what the task involves.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A name or code (or both) briefly describing what the task involves.

name: $description
desc: Returns: A free-text description of what is to be performed.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A free-text description of what is to be performed.

name: $focus
desc: Returns: The request being actioned or the resource being manipulated by this task.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The request being actioned or the resource being manipulated by this task.

name: $for
desc: Returns: The entity who benefits from the performance of the service specified in the task (e.g., the patient).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The entity who benefits from the performance of the service specified in the task (e.g., the patient).

name: $context
desc: Returns: The healthcare event  (e.g. a patient and healthcare provider interaction) during which this task was created.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The healthcare event  (e.g. a patient and healthcare provider interaction) during which this task was created.

name: $executionPeriod
desc: Returns: Identifies the time action was first taken against the task (start) and/or the time final action was taken against the task prior to marking it as completed (end).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies the time action was first taken against the task (start) and/or the time final action was taken against the task prior to marking it as completed (end).

name: $authoredOn
desc: Returns: The date and time this task was created.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date and time this task was created.

name: $lastModified
desc: Returns: The date and time of last modification to this task.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date and time of last modification to this task.

name: $requester
desc: Returns: The creator of the task.

name: $performerType
desc: Returns: The type of participant that can execute the task.

name: $addperformerType
desc: The type of participant that can execute the task.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The type of participant that can execute the task.

name: $owner
desc: Returns: Individual organization or Device currently responsible for task execution.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Individual organization or Device currently responsible for task execution.

name: $reason
desc: Returns: A description or code indicating why this task needs to be performed.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A description or code indicating why this task needs to be performed.

name: $note
desc: Returns: Free-text information captured about the task as it progresses.

name: $addnote
desc: Free-text information captured about the task as it progresses.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Free-text information captured about the task as it progresses.

name: $relevantHistory
desc: Returns: Links to Provenance records for past versions of this Task that identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the task.

name: $addrelevantHistory
desc: Links to Provenance records for past versions of this Task that identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the task.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Links to Provenance records for past versions of this Task that identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the task.

name: $restriction
desc: Returns: If the Task.focus is a request resource and the task is seeking fulfillment (i.e is asking for the request to be actioned), this element identifies any limitations on what parts of the referenced request should be actioned.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: If the Task.focus is a request resource and the task is seeking fulfillment (i.e is asking for the request to be actioned), this element identifies any limitations on what parts of the referenced request should be actioned.

name: $input
desc: Returns: Additional information that may be needed in the execution of the task.

name: $addinput
desc: Additional information that may be needed in the execution of the task.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Additional information that may be needed in the execution of the task.

name: $output
desc: Returns: Outputs produced by the Task.

name: $addoutput
desc: Outputs produced by the Task.
